row.entry: darktable comes with general enhanced basecurve presets for several models that is per automatic applied to raw images for better colors and contrast.

sect4.title: Usage
sect4.para: The basecurve works in camera linear RGB. You can click on any point on the curve and drag to adjust; you can also use the 4 controlpoints (triangles which have a constant vertical value) at bottom to adjust the curve.
